attributes.action: Bring in tax breaks for high tech industry
attributes.additional_details:
The jobs of the future for the the UK will be high value, high technology jobs such as pharmaceuticals aeronautical engineering or other advanced manufacturing. This is not "metal bashing" but to develope thes industries and new start up companies and safe guard the existing ones;
 the government should give tax breaks in these sectors. It is no good investing in an industry such as steel when you have to compete against chinese wages  but can compete against china when you have products which cannot be copied.
